text: Kenneth Wilfred Baker, Baron Baker of Dorking, (born 3 November 1934) is a British politician. He is a former Conservative Member of Parliament and cabinet minister. He served for the offices of Home Secretary, Education Secretary and Conservative Party Chairman. He is a life member of the Tory Reform Group. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kenneth Baker interview at History of Parliament Online Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs
title: Kenneth Baker, Baron Baker of Dorking
